results.definition: a feeling caused by uneasiness or apprehension
examples: a sinking feeling in the pit of my stomach

results.definition: a descent as through liquid (especially through water)
examples: they still talk about the sinking of the Titanic

results.definition: a slow fall or decline (as for lack of strength)
examples: after several hours of sinking an unexpected rally rescued the market
he could not control the sinking of his legs
